creator: Country Delight
descriptionHtml:
Country Delight is an initiative to disrupt India's online milk & grocery delivery market by providing farm-to-table, natural, and locally sourced products. Order placements take place through its food delivery mobile application that aids convenient and hassle-free online milk delivery and online grocery shopping. With an intense focus on quality & testing, we test our milk on more than 26 parameters by an FSSAI approved lab and deliver it under the best cold chain right up to your doorstep within 24-36 hours of milking.
Currently, it serves in Delhi, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Pune, Bangalore, Noida, Jaipur, Chennai, Hyderabad.


Home Delivery of fresh milk and daily groceries:

Choose online delivery through the app and place your online order for milk and daily groceries every day before 10:00 pm and get it delivered the next morning between 5:00 am - 8:00 am with No Delivery Charges. Schedule groceries and milk deliveries and don't pay anything extra for ordering your daily essential items online. There are no minimum order restrictions. Feel free to order as much or as little as you want, and we will deliver it to you!


Country Delight Products:

Explore our wide range of farm-fresh milk and dairy products. Desi Gir and Sahiwal Cow, and Murrah Buffalo milk straight from the farms, premium quality fruits and vegetables, groceries, antibiotic-free eggs, and more delivered to your doorstep. Our milk is sourced directly from the farmers and delivered to you without any intervention of middlemen. Our antibiotic-free eggs are laid by cage-free hens raised on high nutrient feed. Our freshly-baked breads are kneaded with freshly churned butter and have no rising agents or chemicals, and our premium quality fruits and vegetables are freshly harvested.


Key Features of the App

1- Subscribe and forget: Want to avoid the hassle of ordering every day? Set up delivery frequency of your favourite essentials - daily, alternative days or Select Days from the Calendar.
2- Manage your orders and subscription: Order/add items by 10: 00 pm and get milk delivery and grocery delivery the next morning by 5:00 - 8:00 am.
3- Mark Vacation when you're away: You can easily mark ‘vacation’ when you are away or want to hold your milk delivery for some time just put on the start and end date. The subscription resumes automatically on your return.
3- Easy Recharge: Recharge your wallet through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking, Paytm Wallet, and Bharat UPI/GooglePay/PhonePay.
4- Cashback and offers: Select from personalised recharge packs and get exclusive cashback on recharges and avail latest offers through notifications on the app.
5- Easy View Bill: Track your monthly bill, a summary of your monthly consumption and detailed Delivery of each day.


Why Country Delight?

Enables Natural Living: Country Delight milk and dairy products are natural and have no preservatives, additives or emulsifiers. They deliver their products fresh, right from the farms to your home.
Local Sourcing: Country Delight supports local farmers and procures their cow and buffalo milk from nearby farms. Their premium quality groceries, fruits and vegetables are sourced from local farms as well.
Using Science to determine quality: Country Delight uses state-of-the-art technology for testing their milk on 26 parameters for toxins and impurities.
Cold Chain Supply for Packaging and transportation: Their dairy products transportation is done in a temperature-controlled environment, ensuring you get fresh products at your doorstep.
Premium Support all day long - Country Delight has a fully dedicated support team dedicated to resolving your queries and addressing your feedback and complaints.


Feel free to reach out to us at:
Email: info@countrydelight.in
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CountryDelightNatural
Website: https://countrydelight.in/
Privacy Policy: https://countrydelight.in/privacy-policy/
Terms and conditions: https://countrydelight.in/terms-conditions/
descriptionShort: Delivery of Fresh dairy products, grocery, eggs and naturally harvested fruits.

title: Country Delight: Milk Delivery

container.value: Khesra no : 15/1/2/2 , Village Tikri, Post Office Fazilpur, Distt. Gurgaon - 122002

creator: Country Delight
descriptionHtml:
Convenience of online delivery meets the joy of farm-sourced products.

Trusted by 7mn+ people across Mumbai, Delhi, NCR, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Chennai, and other major cities, our products are an integral part of families looking to cut out preservatives and adulterants from their diet.

Our Farm Fresh Cow and Buffalo Milk continue to be the most ordered and most recommended product since we started in 2015. Loved for their purity, consistency, and delightful aroma, our milk products are enjoyed by kids and grandparents alike!

In fact, we delivered 1.5 Crore units of dairy products in April 2022 alone!

Our most popular product of the season, Country Coconut Water, is a trimmed-top tender coconut sourced from Pollachi which is loved for its 300ml water yield and sweet, nutty flavour.

We’ve also recently added Mishti Doi and Taaza Pudina Chaach to our range in select cities. Like our flagship Milk and Desi Danedar Ghee, these too are free of any middlemen intervention.

FAQs


What makes Country Delight different from other milk brands?
We engage directly with dairy farmers outside your city to procure fresh Cow and Buffalo milk twice every day. To ensure only the best quality, we are sourcing milk only from indigenous breeds like Gir, Sahiwal, Ongle, etc. We don’t recombine or overprocess our milk. After checking its quality over 72 parameters, we deliver natural, fresh, and unadulterated milk to your doorstep.

When do I have to place my order to get the products?
You can place or modify your order till 12 midnight. Our excellent delivery team will place your order at your doorstep. Just open your door and pick it up anytime after 7 AM.

Do I have to order daily?
You can place your daily order till 12 midnight for the next day delivery or create a customized subscription plan as per your family’s consumption habits. Most of our customers prefer subscribing to products like Milk and Coconut for daily delivery. This regular flow of farm-sourced essentials will help your family consume the healthiest, tastiest products every day. Choose a product as ‘Buy Once’ or ‘Subscribe’ on our app.

Does your Coconut actually have 2 glasses of water?
All our tender coconuts are analyzed with advanced technology to determine their quantity and quality. We only procure Coconuts with approximately 300ml tender water. We actively engage with farmers, who are good judges of Coconut taste and fullness, to bring you the best of India’s produce.

How do I get the Milk Test Kit?
Our Milk test kit comes free with the trial offer for new consumers only. You can also order one for Rs. 100.

What’s with all the Malai ads?
Our malai ads are a result of our customers’ feedback about our milk. The custom of separating cream from fresh milk to make Ghee, Paneer, or Khoya at home still thrives in our homes. Our customers love using our Milk to keep up this tradition. The thick layer of malai seen in our videos is the actual malai from boiled Country Delight milk after it has been cooled overnight.
Experience daily essentials with No Preservatives, No Chemicals, and No Adulteration ever.

To know more about our products, download our app. Claim your 100% Cashback and give our products a try.
descriptionShort: Subscribe for fresh milk delivery online. Assured 7am doorstep delivery, daily.

title: Country Delight: Milk Delivery

container.value: Khesra no : 15/1/2/2 , Village Tikri, Post Office Fazilpur, Distt. Gurgaon - 122002

creator: Country Delight
descriptionHtml:
Delivering farm-fresh Milk every day at your doorstep by 7AM.

Trusted by 10mn+ people across Mumbai, Delhi, NCR, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Chennai, and now delivering to all the major cities, our products are an integral part of families looking to cut out preservatives and adulterants from their every day grocery.

Our Preservatives-Free Cow and Buffalo Milk continue to be the most ordered and most recommended products since we started in 2015. Loved for their purity, consistency, and delightful aroma, our milk products are enjoyed by even kids and grandparents!

Another one of our most ordered products, Country Coconut Water, is a trimmed-top tender coconut sourced from Pollachi. These Pollachi sourced ‘nuts bring you approximately 300ml water every time, and assured sweet, nutty flavour.

We also offer other delightful grocery items like Taaza Paneer, Ghar Jaisa Dahi, Mishti Doi, Taaza Pudina Chaach. Added to that, we are now delivering Fresh Fruits and Vegetables in select cities.

Like our flagship Milk and Desi Danedar Ghee, these products too are free of any middlemen intervention, chemical washing, and are delivered through an extensively monitored, advanced cold-chain system.

How does Country Delight deliver direct from the farm?
We engage directly with dairy farmers within 100kms radius of your city to procure fresh Cow and Buffalo milk twice every day. We don’t recombine or overprocess our milk or any other grocery items in our range. After checking its quality over 72 parameters, including synthetic hormones, antibiotics, and naturally occuring toxins, we pasteurise all Milk for safety, and we are delivering it to your homes within just 18-24 hours of collection. Our direct-from-farm and in-house delivery partners help us make your life easier.

How to receive my order daily?
You can place or modify your order till 12 midnight for Milk and other dairy items. For fresh fruits and vegetables, the daily cut-off ranges from 10pm to 12pm depending on your location. Our excellent delivery team will place your order at your doorstep. Just open your door to Fresh Milk, Milk Products, Fruits and vegetables anytime after 7 AM.

It is also easy to get our Milk or fruits and vegetables every day by creating a subscription plan for these essential groceries. Our customizable subscription plan makes life easier in more ways than one. It empowers you to get fresh milk every day while also giving you a transparent view of your monthly spends on groceries. This regular flow of farm-sourced essentials, combined with the flexibility to modify or add more products till midnight, will make consuming clean, healthy, tasty products every day very easy.


How much time does Country Delight take to deliver?
We take less than 12 hours to deliver fresh, adulteration-tested, FSSAI certified products to your doorstep. To receive Country Delight Milk, place your order anytime till 12 midnight and get assured doorstep delivery by 7AM next morning. We also deliver our newly launched fruits and vegetables range early morning before you start your day.

Experience the goodness of farm-fresh, chemical-free grocery delivered every day.

To know more about our products, download our app. Claim your Rs. 100 Cashback and give our products a try.

container.value: Khesra no : 15/1/2/2 , Village Tikri, Post Office Fazilpur, Distt. Gurgaon - 122002

creator: Country Delight
descriptionHtml:
Experience the convenience of milk home delivery with the Country Delight app! Select from a wide range of fresh milk, milk products like yogurt, pure cow milk ghee, and a premium selection of daily essentials including breads and, fruits and vegetables.

🤳Effortlessly order once or set a custom subscription for grocery delivery of:

🐃 Pure Cow Milk and Buffalo Milk
🐮 A2 Cow Milk and Low Fat Cow Milk
🍌 Seasonal fruits and vegetables
🍈🥥🌴Tender Coconut Water
🍞Breakfast staples like Eggs and Bread
and more...

With our seamless app shopping experience, you'll never have to worry about milk delivery ever again.

Choose us for:

✅Pasteurized, Pure Cow and Buffalo Milk Delivery
Sourced directly from farmer partners, we eliminate the risk of adulteration by ensuring no middlemen are involved. You get thick and naturally tasty milk delivered right at your home. Use it worry-free for your family's daily milk needs. With our milk's rich creaminess, you can go back to your roots and make clarified butter (ghee) at home.

🌱Naturally Ripened Fruits and Chemical Color-Free Vegetables
From tomatoes to dragon fruit to hydroponic lettuces and capsicums, Country Delight is a full-service app for your fresh grocery delivery. All fresh produce is sourced from reliable partners and is delivered only after thorough quality inspections.

💰Save big on milk delivery with our Free VIP Membership Trial
This limited-period offer empowers you to experience our top-quality products at 40% OFF like a VIP. The offer applies to all products. So sign up now and set your first milk delivery for our customer favorites Buffalo Milk, Cow Milk, A2 Cow Milk, or our new launches, Low Malai Milk (Toned Buffalo Milk) and Creamy Cow Milk (Full Fat Cow Milk). For terms and conditions check out the VIP Membership plan on our app.

😎👌🔥Here are 10 other reasons why the Country Delight app needs to be your top choice for your daily grocery delivery:

🕖 Assured 7 AM doorstep delivery at no extra charges. Yes, we deliver one single packet of milk too.

🚪 Add or modify your order till 11:59 at night, and still get assured home delivery the next morning.
🌿 Freshness guaranteed! You'll experience a difference in taste, mouthfeel, aroma, cooking time, and your gut health with our fresh, natural products.

🚷 No preservatives, no additives, and no chemicals in any products.

🏆 72 quality tests are done on milk every day. Ruling out all possibilities of adulteration, spoilage, and mixing.

🥝 Your milk delivery app plus a wide range of groceries including pulses, ghee, chaach, lassi, spices, oils, bread, dry fruits, and more, make it a full-service app for your daily needs.

📆 All your grocery delivery is automated! Start a subscription to get milk and grocery deliveries daily, weekly, or custom set it as you like.

🤑 Easy payments and billing management with an in-built wallet. Manage your monthly expenses through your secure wallet and get billed only when you receive your delivery successfully.

🙋‍♀️ Save as much as Rs.3700 with our VIP membership plans starting at Rs. 145 only.

⚡ Flash deals and cashback offers every day! Stay tuned for exciting offers, discounts, and promotions exclusively available through our app.

Download the Country Delight app and make it your daily milk delivery and grocery delivery app.
We are present in all major cities: Delhi, Gurugram, Noida, Faridabad, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Lucknow, Surat, Jaipur, Chandigarh, Bengaluru, Coimbatore, Mysore, Nashik, Guntur, Vijayawada, Warangal, and are expanding to more! You can opt for 🔕 No-Doorbell-Delivery for early morning slots. All our deliveries are contactless and safe.
Have a happy start to living better!
